title: Bug 14047 StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is being redrawn N times, which is inefficient.
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is being redrawn N times. This can be observed by adding the following line to StyledText performPaint: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
SR:
1. Open the application with StyledText feature enabled.
2. Append N lines to the StyledText.
3. Observe the redraws occurring during the text change.
